title: ADVERTISEMENT.

book.title: Ancient Classics for English Readers
book.description: 简介： It is proposed to give, in these little volumes, some such introduction to the great writers of Greece and Rome as may open to those who have not received a classical educationor in whose case it has been incomplete and fragmentarya fair acquaintance...
